an3.101:1.9: dhantaṃ sandhantaṃ → adhantaṃ asandhantaṃ (sya-all, km) | niddhantaṃ aniddhantakasāvaṃ → anihitaṃ anikkhittakasāvaṃ (bj); aniddhantaṃ anihitaṃ aninnītakasāvaṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an3.101:1.11: niddhantaṃ niddhantakasāvaṃ → nihitaṃ nikkhittakasāvaṃ (bj); nihitaṃ ninnītakasāvaṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an3.101:2.5: sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato → sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritavato (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); sasaṅkhāraniggayhavārivāvato (mr); sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāriyādhigato (?)
an3.101:2.6: sannisīdati ekodi hoti → ekodibhāvaṃ gacchati (si); ekodibhāvo hoti (sya-all, km, mr)
